Reviews.Title: little information
Reviews.Author: Davis
Reviews.Content: I wonder if this is really the model E988 or E985the information is very confusing, no purchase security ... there are countries that need the 3g band 850 mkhthe information is very contradictory, on the one hand says something on the other hand says otherwise .. besides I find it strange not to see comments people ...I would like to buy it, but for me the enviacen pro g Lg E985 does not help me in my country deficiency 850 mkh
